sentence.Network_en: Her forgetfulness is due to advancing age.
sentence.Network_cn: 她由于年事已高而变得健忘。

sentence.Network_en: The lovers roamed around the fields in complete forgetfulness of time.
sentence.Network_cn: 这对情侣漫步于田野,完全忘记了时间.

sentence.Network_en: I'msorry I didn't answer your letter - I can only plead forgetfulness.
sentence.Network_cn: 对不起没有给你回信,对此我只能以忘记作为托词.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Sinograma  - Diccionario de... ... 通性[ general character] 忘性[ forgetfulness] 悟性[ understanding;comprehension].
健忘术(Forgetfulness),3级,12点,战斗,基础：使敌人单一远程部队的一半无法进行远程攻击。高级：使敌人单一远程部队无法进行远程 …
You should forgive him for his forgetfulness ; all , he is over seventy ., 你应该原谅他的健忘症 , 毕竟他已经七十多岁了.
forgetfully adv. 健忘地forgetfulness n. 健忘，怠慢forgive (forgave, forgiven) vt. no longer have the.

list.abs: 八年级上册英语语法复习全册 ... stop doing sth 停止做某事 forget doing sth 忘记做过某事 go on doing sth 继续做某事.
欧品乐 - OpinLe ... 密码 password 忘记密码 forget password 下次登录 remember me.
晓美焰_百度百科 ... you are not alone. 你就不是孤身一人 Don't forget 不要忘记 Always. somewhere. 在某个角落始终.
英语中不能直译的句子_小颖_新浪博客 ... We'll see. 再说吧。 Forget it. 算了吧。 Take care. 请多保重。.

entry.def: Someone who is forgetful often forgets things.

example.ex: My mother has become very forgetful and confused recently.
example.tran: 我妈妈近来变得非常健忘，糊里糊涂。

means.word_mean: 2. unawareness caused by neglectful or heedless failure to remember;

sentences.sentence: "his forgetfulness increased as he grew older"

auth_sentence.content: Yet though myriads sought forgetfulness, even more found satisfaction.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet though myriads sought forgetfulness, even more found satisfaction.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet though myriads sought forgetfulness, even more found satisfaction.

auth_sentence.content: There was something Freudian about my forgetfulness.
auth_sentence.res_content: There was something Freudian about my forgetfulness.
